data.title: City of Santa Maria, CA SIGNS
data.meta_description: Ch 12-34  The purpose of this Chapter is to regulate signs located on private property within the City and on property owned by public agencies other than the City and over which the City has zoning and land use regulatory power.(Ord. 92-19, eff. 12/31/92; Ord. 20
data.meta_site_name: City of Santa Maria, CA Code
